name: Christmas Ghost
description:
This game was developed during the 8 hours Berlin Mini Game Jam in November 2016 with Oussama Bouanani.  I didn't make the music.

You are a ghost and your objective is to possess people and carry christmas gifts they are carrying. 

- Left mouse click to possess

- Right mouse click to un-possess

- W to move forward 

- E to throw a gift
